comments.body: Why are we cross linking to the docs repo?
Because that is where the docs for dns live.
What is the general policy for cross-linking? I assume over time these links might break.

I am not sure the policy for cross linking.  We should probably develop a story around that with devrel.  These docs are generally in a bad state and we are moving them out of the docs repo to reduce maintenance overhead.  I am less concerned about the links breaking than I am about the staleness of the technical content (At least when the links break it is obvious what is broken). I am just porting over this change because it was made in the docs repo before after I moved it to this repo.

Ok. I have no issues with this change. Its just that I have noticed very many links being broken even within the same repo. Thats why I expressed that concern.
This PR is fine as-is. May be we can consider maintaining a copy of the DNS doc here too?
That sounds reasonable, or even just extend the link checker to do cross repo checks and run continuously every hour.
